meanings.sent1: The puppy's tractableness made it simple to teach him new tricks.
meanings.sent2: The tractableness of the computer program allowed for easy customization.
meanings.sent3: The tractableness of the puzzle made it a breeze to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her tractableness in following instructions was like a well-trained horse.
meanings.sent5: The tractableness of the clay made it perfect for shaping into pottery.

meanings.definition: Capable of being influenced or persuaded
meanings.sent1: His tractableness in the negotiation process made reaching an agreement smooth.
meanings.sent2: The tractableness of the student's attitude towards learning was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The tractableness of the cat to play dress-up was unexpected but adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her tractableness in changing her mind was like a leaf swaying in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The tractableness of the fabric allowed for easy sewing and alterations.
